edge: Lage Raho Munna Bhai has received 4 National Film Awards, which are prestigious awards conferred by the Government of India to recognize excellence in Indian cinema.

node_2: academy award for best foreign film
edge: Although there were speculations that Lage Raho Munna Bhai would represent India as an entry for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Film, it ultimately lost to Rang De Basanti as India's official submission. Neither film received a nomination.
The producers of Lage Raho Munna Bhai submitted it as an independent entry, but neither film received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Film.
